programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '50s - Bob Hope (10/31/80)
programme.desc: The inimitable Bob Hope offers his 2 cents on the Reagan – Carter debate andsleeping in the Lincoln bedroom.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Joan Embery (8/15/91)
programme.desc: A two-headed snake is brought to the show by Joan Embery. Dennis Hopper also joins the fun.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of The Mighty Carson Art Players (5/8/87)
programme.desc: Paul Reiser talks about getting a sensitive body part stuck in an exercise machine.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Richard Pryor (5/4/77)
programme.desc: Richard Pryor chats about his California-style divorce and Chevy Chase discusses his Gerald Ford impression.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Joan Embery (1/18/90)
programme.desc: Animal wrangler Joan Embery brings a rare Canadian Lynx to the show, and actor Ron Silver also visits.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Dinah Shore (11/10/77)
programme.desc: Fellow talk show host and chart-topping vocalist Dinah Shore sings 2 of her hits.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - George C. Scott (11/3/87)
programme.desc: George C. Scott chats about his love of theatre, the many bombs in which he’s appeared and turning 60.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Kevin Bacon (1/31/92)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon talks about this new kid and Amanda Plummer talks about her famous parents

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Carl Reiner (10/18/74)
programme.desc: Carl Reiner talks about the World Series and his days in the Army! David Brenner covers LA earthquakes.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Peter Falk (10/5/73)
programme.desc: Catch a rack of iconic rumpled raincoats worn by 4-time Emmy winner Peter Falk in his detective show Columbo.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Richard Pryor (6/9/83)
programme.desc: Richard Pryor pokes fun at his failure at marriage and reflects on his new sobriety.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Joan Rivers (12/13/78)
programme.desc: The legendary Joan Rivers talks giving birth and politics, but not necessarily at the same time.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '90s - Bill Maher (11/3/89)
programme.desc: Stand-up comic Bill Maher describes growing up half Jewish and half Catholic.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Richard Pryor (10/9/86)
programme.desc: Richard Pryor discusses dropping 20 pounds for a movie role and driving his Ferrari across the US.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Michael J. Fox (11/3/88)
programme.desc: Michael J. Fox talks Family Ties and marriage, Larry Miller does standup and Harry Lorayne tests your memory.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '90s - Kenneth Branagh (8/23/91)
programme.desc: Comedian David Steinberg talks about going to Theological school before his career as a comedian.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Dom Deluise (3/6/73)
programme.desc: Dom Deluise on earthquakes, Bruno Vailati on sharks and Sally Kellerman on the Queen of England.

programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - George C. Scott (11/3/87)
programme.desc: George C. Scott chats about his love of theatre, the many bombs in which he’s appeared and turning 60.
